name: Paltergeist
description:
A 3D puzzle mobile game where you play as a ghost that had died from a sleepwalking incident. Left to roam the region of Malaysia, you decide to help sleepwalkers around the region to reach safely back to their bed to avoid suffering the same horrible fate as yourself. Solve puzzles and navigate the sleepwalker through obstacles scattered around the Malaysian themed houses to reach their bed safely.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
